definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: spark (fr. above √, = strike out a spark, acc. to Thes RobGes, cf. Sta:§ 216 (doubtfully), Lag:BN 182 Kö:ii. 147, § 71. 1, NH [[כִּדּוֹד]] = rod (of iron, etc.); [[כִּדּוֹדִיּוֹתְ שֶׁל אֵשׁ]] i.e. red-hot rods; but Ba:NB § 142, 139 der. this and [[כַּדְכִּד]] fr. √ [[כיד]] = Ar. kyd, ka0da emit fire (said of a fire-stick, zandun, Lane:2639 b, cf. 1257 b), and so Buhl)—only pl. cstr. [[כִּידוֹדֵי אֵשׁ]] Job 41:11 of breath of crocodile (‖[[לַפִּידִים]]).
